product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Tri-Awning Sun Shelter - Special Buy
long_description: Keep the sun off you throughout the day with the ALPS Mountaineering Tri-Awning Sun Shelter. It's easy to move around and offers easy adjustment. Sunshade can be adjusted to increase headroom or lowered to increase coverage; included side fabric panel offers even more protection. Constructed of 75-denier, UV-resistant polyester with a resilient urethane coating. The ALPS Mountaineering Tri-Awning Sun Shelter comes with stakes, guyline cord and carry bag. Special buy.
short_description: Keep the sun off you throughout the day with the ALPS Mountaineering Tri-Awning Sun Shelter. It's easy to move around and offers easy adjustment.
